name: mdsr_form_1
description: Notification form, Format to be filled by Primary informant for all Womenâ€™s Death (15-49) years

state_id.description: this field hold the state id

district_id.description: this field hold the district id

block_id.description: this field hold the block id

village_id.description: this field hold the village id

deceased_women_fname.description: first name of the women who has been died due maternal

deceased_women_mname.description: middle name of the women who has been died due maternal

deceased_women_lname.description: last name of the women who has been died due maternal

deceased_women_address.description: last name of the women who has been died due maternal

husband_name.description: husband name of the deceased women

father_name.description: father name of the deceased women

date_of_birth.description: date of the birth of the deceased women

age.description: Age will be calculate of the deceased women based on her date of birth

mcts_id.description: Unique identifier of the deceased women in MCTS - Mother and Child Tracking System

mobile.description: contact number of the deceased women if person is individaul

place_of_death.description: where death occur of the deceased women from - [home,health facility, transit, other]

place_of_death_other.description: if death occured other place then specify where

when_death_occur.description: when did death occured in the given option- [ During pregnancy, During delivery, Within 42 days after delivery, During abortion or within 6 weeks after abortion]

is_maternal_death.description: if when did death occured value is either any one of the given values then maternal death else non-maternal death

reporting_person.description: death reported by the person name

reporting_person_mobile.description: contact number of the reporting person if person is individaul

reporting_person_address.description: contact number of the reporting person if person is individaul

facility_id.description: Verification by ANM of the respective Sub-center that death of women occurred during pregnancy or within 42 days of delivery/abortion

name.description: name of the person who has report maternal death or done verification

uuid.description: uniqe id for the maternal case
